events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store but it arrived the wrong size. I would like to initiate a return and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to the mention of a return and refund request.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle this case to ensure timely and proper assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear about the sizing issue with your jacket, and I’m here to help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and still has all the original tags attached?
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 4526890. The jacket is new, unworn, and all tags are still attached.

Great, thank you for confirming. We will provide you with a prepaid return shipping label via email. Once we receive the jacket, we will process your refund to the original payment method within 5 business days.
That sounds perfect, thank you for making this so easy and clear. I’ll wait for the return label in my email.
The return label has been sent to your email address. Please ship the jacket back, and we will ensure the refund is processed promptly upon receipt.
Just checking in to confirm if your jacket was returned successfully and if you have received your refund without any issues.
Yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday and already received the refund today. Thank you very much for your assistance!
We’re glad everything went smoothly. Your case has now been closed. Please reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
A short survey has been sent to your email to gather feedback on your experience with our refund process.
